predicate.note: Frames file for 'dispose' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'unload'.

role.descr: agent, entity getting rid of something
instrument or manner, if separate from agent

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Armstrong said that *trace* disposing of the carpet business would improve ``total financial performance.''

example.name: with instrument
example.text: John disposed of the priceless Picasso with a wood chipper.
